name: Hover Taxi (Cup Puppy Games)
description:
This is a game I made in a week.

It's my first time making a game with JavaScript and WebGL2.

Use the arrow keys to control the hover taxi.

On the minimap red markers show places to pick people up. The white flashing dot is you, the green dot is where you need to take the customer.

I expect there will be a lot of bugs here. I tested it on Firefox and it seems ok. The texture load after the game has already started, so you may need to wait or try refreshing the page.
